            Abhishek Kumar
          
          
            
              Abhishek Kumar is a classically trained botanist and plant ecologist living in Chandigarh. He is currently working as senior research fellow at Panjab University, Chandigarh. His research focuses the patterns and processes of plant distribution and diversity in Indian Siwaliks. He frequently collaborates with researchers who study plant ecology, community ecology, and biogeography.
